item.title: Chris Kempczinski, CEO of McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, is asked if Kevin Ozan‚Äôs departure is related to the criminal RICO case targeting them.
item.description: Click this link to see the original LinkedIn post. Dear Mr. Kempczinski, Is Mr. Ozan‚Äôs departure related to the criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and if yes, to which extent is it related? (look at the screenshot üëá to understand) You also mention Mr. Ozan‚Äôs ‚Äúunwavering integrity,‚Äù could you please confirm he reported internally my stern warnings about the crimes McDonald‚Äôs is engaging into? As the CFO, he obviously should have understood McDonald’s Corporation is engaging in money laundering, shouldn’t he?

item.title: Formal notice sent to Neuberger Berman‚Äôs CEO Mr. George Walker regarding McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-03-16_0042_0800_formal_notice_to_george_walker_neuberger_berman_with_email_Redacted.pdf KEY POINT OF THIS EMAIL: I formally notified Neuberger Berman that ‚ÄúNeuberger Berman has invested in a company which has engaged in a pattern of racketeering activity‚Äù and that therefore ‚ÄúNeuberger Berman is about to commit the crime of money laundering as defined in 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 1957 and the purpose of this communication is to try to alert [them] of what has happened so far in the McDonald‚Äôs RICO case.

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski and Mahonri Manjarrez regarding the phone call incident to the FBI
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-15_2333_0800_email_to_adam_rogalski_and_mahonri_manjarrez_Redacted.pdf From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: FBI hanging up on me Date sentÔºö2023-02-15 23:33 (Beijing time +0800) To: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI, Language Specialist US Government), Adam Rogalski (Assistant Legal-Attach√©) Cc: U.S. Ambassador Burns, U.S. Ambassador Bauer, Edward Lehman, David K. Colapinto, Yves Strickler (I will try to update this section soon) BeijingACS@state.gov and ParisExec@state.gov, please forward this email to the Legal Attach√©.

item.title: Email to Mahonri Manjarrez. Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist?
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist? Date sentÔºö2023-01-27 17:32 (Beijing time +0800) To: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI, Language Specialist US Government) Cc: Adam Rogalski (Assistant Legal-Attach√©), [Edward Lehman], and many more people (I will try to update this section soon) My reference for this case: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity Dear Mr. Manjarrez, As a victim of the transnational criminal enterprise orchestrated by the criminal entity McDonald‚Äôs Corporation, I would like to ask you three questions:

item.title: Email to Adam Rogalski. Are you back Mr. Rogalski? Who is the Special Agent in Charge of the investigation?
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: Are you back Mr. Rogalski? Who is the Special Agent in Charge of the investigation? Date sentÔºö2023-01-20 15:35 (Beijing time +0800) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department) Cc: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist), Edward Lehman Dear Sir or Madam who will receive this email sent to BeijingACS@state.gov, please forward this email to the Legat office even though it seems that Mr. Rogalski‚Äôs email address is functional again.

item.title: Email sent on 2022-12-29 to the F.B.I. to ask who is the case agent in charge of the case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: [Mr. Manjarrez‚Äôs username]@fbi.gov

Cc: Edward Lehman, Muyi Xiao (NYTimes), Kevin Granville (Business Editor at NYTimes), Constant M√©heut (NYTimes), David Enrich (NYTimes), Michael Forsythe (NYTimes)

Bcc: Yves Strickler (French law professor)

Subject: Who is the case agent in charge of the criminal investigation?

Date sent: 2022-12-29 at 01:17 Beijing time (+0800)

item.title: Sending the F.B.I. my reference for the case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation for fraud and money laundering + additional warnings
item.description:
On 2022-04-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to give them my reference for the case targeting the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald‚Äôs Corporation for fraud and money laundering.

I am also reminding the F.B.I. that the law firm representing McDonald‚Äôs France was P√©chenard & Associ√©s, a law firm which belongs to and/or used to belong to the parents of the former General Director of the French National Police.

FROM : [Whistle-blower‚Äôs email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information

TO : [Mr. Rogalski‚Äôs username]@state.gov

SUBJECT: Case number McDonald’s

item.title: Sending the F.B.I. my reference for the case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation for fraud and money laundering + additional warnings
item.description:
On 2022-04-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to give them my reference for the case targeting the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald‚Äôs Corporation for fraud and money laundering.

I am also reminding the F.B.I. that the law firm representing McDonald‚Äôs France was P√©chenard & Associ√©s, a law firm which belongs to and/or used to belong to the parents of the former General Director of the French National Police.

FROM : [Whistle-blower‚Äôs email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez‚Äôs username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: Case number McDonald’s

item.title: Whistle-blower asking the F.B.I. if they received and kept the emails which were sent in 2015 and if they ever launched a criminal investigation against McDonald‚Äôs Corporation
item.description:
On 2022-04-20, I sent an email to the F.B.I. to ask them if they ever received the emails I sent them back in 2015 regarding the major case targeting McDonald‚Äôs Corporation.

I also ask the F.B.I. if they ever launched a criminal investigation targeting the transnational criminal enterprise.

FROM : [Whistle-blower‚Äôs email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information

TO : [Mr. Rogalski‚Äôs username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez‚Äôs username]@fbi.gov

SUBJECT: Has the FBI ever received the emails I sent in 2015?

item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the serious frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
Key point of this event: the F.B.I. is now formally notified of some of the crimes I am accusing McDonald‚Äôs Corporation and/or its subsidiary companies of.

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Subject:: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds

item.title: Email sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attach√©, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.) informing them that I am now resuming my explanations.

This is the first email which was sent at 15:32 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Answer sent by email to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez on October 05, 2021, at 01:20 (am) Beijing time.

item.title: Email received from Assistant Legal Attach√© Adam Rogalski ‚Äì one of the FBI representatives in Beijing
item.description:
On 2021-09-20, I receive for the first time an email from Assistant Legal Attach√© Adam Rogalski, ‚Äúone of the FBI representatives in Beijing.‚Äù

FROM : [Mr. Rogalski‚Äôs username]@state.gov

TO : [Whistle-blower‚Äôs email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information about me

SUBJECT: Request to contact FBI office in Beijing

item.title: Transcript of the phone conversation with the FBI‚Äôs Field Office of Chicago
item.description: Transcript of the phone conversation between me and the FBI‚Äôs Field Office of Chicago. I called them on December 23, 2015, at 20:30 (8:30pm) Beijing time.

item.title: F.B.I. Chicago answers the victim asking him to please contact the FBI's Public Access Line
item.description:
On 2015-12-18, I receive an answer from the Intake Unit of the Field Office of the F.B.I. in Chicago.

FROM : Chicago@ic.fbi.gov

TO : [Whistle-blower‚Äôs email address] Visit X-v-France.com for more information about me

SUBJECT: RE: McDonald’s massive fraud in Europe
